message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies.pdf: Página 107
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
107 
STUDY CASE. INTEGRATING THE ONTOLOGY TO BE 
REUSED 
Links between terms of the reused ontology and the ontology to be developed should be established. 
To answer CQ4 (with which substances does Frenadol® interact?) we have added this rule to the ontology: 
interactsWith(?x, ?y), part(?x, ?z) -> interactsWith(?z, ?y)  
We have added the axioms identified in task 1.1 (e.g. isMainActiveIngredient is subrelation of isPartOf)
speaker: SYSTEM
